评论详情: I don't often write reviews, but I just had to. This shirt is perfect! The material is wonderful! It is soft and it drapes nicely. I could even dress it up and wear it to go out and it's perfect for the gym. It is slightly sheer but not see through (which I actually wanted to show off my sports bra a little). It is well made and it shapes the body just perfectly. I generally buy a small or a medium depending on how I want the shirt to fit. I'm a 34D and I bought a medium and it does fit a little big on the armpit sides. I won't be returning this one but when I purchase again (which I certainly will) I will probably select a small. If you're thinking about it, just buy it, you won't regret it.

I have bought soooo many tank tops trying to find the perfect ones.  These are or for me.  Really sexy back.  Great colors and fabric.  Wears and washes beautifully.  They are so cute on!!  Highly recommend!!  I have bought every color and multiple black and white ones as those are the ones I wear the most.  They look great for the gym and super cute with shorts and jeans for a look outside of the gym.  Love love these!!

I love these shirts! I have bought them in over 6 different colors and absolutely love the fit. I wear them to the gym every morning and the soft fabric is comfortable without being too clingy. They also allow free range of motion which is great for me when lifting weights. They have held up great through many washes.

评论概述: Great for workouts but cut is long
评论详情: I bought this (in several colors) to replace some other tops I bought on Amazon a year ago, same style, but these are quite a bit longer in length. I have to knit them on the side.  Quick drying fabric is great though

I bought 2.  The red is a medium.  The blue is XS.  I bought it for my daughter but it was too big on her, so I kept it.  Maybe my next one will be a small.  🙂They both fit nicely, depending on whether I want it loose and flowy, or more fitted.  I am 5’10”, 135 lbs.  the top is soft, and well made.  I actually do intend to get one more.  If they had more colors I liked, I would probably get more than that.  I might use it as a work out too, but I really like it with jeans too.My only complaint (besides not enough color variety) is that the straps are kind of close together in the front, as if it were made for someone with narrow shoulders (why I thought it might work for my very lean 14 year old).  Most straps land over my bra straps.  Hard to tell in the photos, but thee straps are nearly an inch in.Still a great top.  Recommend.

I loved the fit and style of this shirt. I have worn it twice for my walk/runs. However, I noticed a really weird smell straight out of the package. I washed it and it seemed to go away. I aired dried it and it seemed to take forever to dry. Not a good sign for a workout shirt. Also both times I wore it and I got sweaty, that really strange smell came back. I know it’s not me because none of my other clothes smell this way. Whenever it gets wet it stinks really bad. Thinking of getting rid of it or just not using it to work out in. Very disappointing as it’s a pretty shirt.
True to size. sheer, but I don't mind it. I accidentally ordered an XS, but I like the style. It's really nice for hot weather and it's nice as a travel clothing staple.
Very comfortable, loose fit and great buttery soft material
These tanks are wonderful! They are so soft and comfortable. I can wear them to workout or around town.
I'm an xl lady being five foot three and 205 lbs this shirt fits me really well but isn't too snug. It is also fairly long in the torso wich is really nice I hate shirts that are too short.

Surprisingly more support than I expected. My only gripe, and it isn’t big enough to be a deal breaker, I wish the material was stitched up to the bra a little more under the arm so it wouldn’t droop AS much. But really, it fits true to size, comfortable, and supportive.

Super cute, love the way it fits. But you can’t wear it for very long because anything and everything will leave a mark on it and it does not come off in the washer. Got stained because I sprayed perfume on me like I do with every other piece of clothing I own, but it stained the shirt and it would not come off. Also, if you have sweaty armpits, It will be extremely obvious in the shirt. Super cute for maybe around the house but definitely not if you’re trying to look good in public.

5'4", around 142-144lbs, 34B-C, waist: ca. 29-30"; hips: ca. 38-39". I bought a size small, and it kinda fits, just not as expected...  So, I have a very similar top from a different brand that has a high crew neck instead of the V that this one has, but with an open back, just like this one (only curved, as well, not a "V"). I love the other style! Color, flow, everything! But I wanted to try a V-neck, and the other style doesn't come in light purple, which is one of my favorite colors to wear.  My problem with this one is that the V-neck-line comes up awkwardly narrow leaving some flabby material around the armpit area... I don't want to try a medium, because even the small makes me look quite like a brick not really narrowing at my waistline. I realize I have wide shoulders and back, — maybe it isn't a problem for someone with a narrower statue...  I will keep it, as I still like the color, and if I wrap the shoulder straps around my sports bra's straps, the front kinda drapes the way I wish it was in the first place. I just have to keep adjusting it, hence the 3 stars. (I can't seamlessly alter the strap length, it would be too obvious and I'm not paying another $20 to have it done. ;))
Good quality, true to size and cute

评论概述: flattering for hourglass figures, and soft AF
评论详情: My bodytype etc: I'd like to say this top was such an unexpected surprise! I hardly ever have success buying clothes online because I fluctuate in weight so much. I have trouble finding tops that flatter my figure when I'm carrying extra weight around my middle, because my shoulders are the same width as my hips. Tank tops are either too boxy or blobby on me, or they cling to my stomach (thereby forcing me to do the TC Tugger dance. If you don't know what TC Tuggers are, Google).  The good stuff: This top is sooo soft, flowy, and falls right off the curves in all the right spots! It's also sexy af y'all. Hides the tum curves, hugs the good curves! I loved the first one I bought so much, I had to go back and order one is every color. I will admit, I bought the beige color first, and I LOVE it, but it reminds me of a dusty rose more than beige. Looks cute braless or with a cute bralette underneath. This is my new go-to top for everything--from working out to going out (when we can *go out* again).  Bottom Line: If you're looking for some cute quarantine tops to spice up your pj or lounge wardrobe (because you're not really going out or anywhere interesting yet), this is your new top. If you're looking to turn heads with that sexy back in the grocery store because your mask covers your face, this is your new top! If you're looking for something comfy but also sexy, THIS IS IT. If you're looking for something loose-fitting for workouts, this is also it. Honestly, wear this top in any scenario, and you'll be happy.

I got this top to work out it and I love this material. Light weight I love it. The material feels amazing on my body I am getting another one. This is the perfect top for me to walk around my neighborhood love it.
Overall I like it.

To not be deceived this is not a sports bra and tank top combo, it is just a very thin tank top, you will still need a sports bra underneath, a little expensive in my opinion for as cheap as this material is.
I wore this tank while camping and loved loved loved them. I got them in all colors! I’m 5’6 135 lbs and bought a Small

This is the second one I ordered. The first one was maroon large and too big but still cute so I kept it and decided to try the medium. After I got the medium I realized exactly how big the large was and that the medium was a way better fit. So I ordered the maroon one in medium too!! I really like the tank and how it looks and makes me feel. I lost 40lbs over the last 9 months and love that I’m able to wear clothes like this and feel confident in my skin! It’s soft and comfortable, not to tight or to loose. Just make sure you order the right size!!
Wanted to live this so bad but returned

评论概述: 🤣  this is the thinnest "opaque" shirt I have ever bought and that is saying a lot!
评论详情: I understand this is supposed to be an exercise shirt, which would imply it is breathable and it is because it's THIN AS FARK... but ... it's not made of active wear material (the black one is 70% modal, 30% polyester) which makes it look and feel incredibly cheap.  I did buy it with the intent of using it as a workout top so it shouldn't matter so much that the coverage is poor, I really just don't like feeling like I'm being taken advantage of when it comes to price and quality. At the time of purchase, this shirt is being sold for $20 and it is honestly worth $10 (even with inflation and all those shenanigans). This shirt does not spark joy.  As far as the fit, it does seem to run on the smaller side (this is not a problem I usually have-- I do try lots of clothes-- so I'm assuming it is the shirt and not me gaining weight). It is not cut in a flattering way-- i.e. the back fits well like if I bought the next size up then the back opening would look large and awkward-- but there is no flow or movement in the front of this shirt. If you are bloated in any way it will show.
Very soft and comfortable but order a siz down from what you usually wear
Bought this from my hot yoga classes it’s light flattering.  bought it  in four colors
This top is cut just right.  I love it!  The material is a little on the sheer side but not see thru.  But that works for me as I'm wearing it to the gym.  I will be ordering more. Fits as expected.
So lightweight and cute. I love it!
Super comfy and light- a little long bc I’m 5’2 but needed the size for my chest.
Great fit, attractive, high quality

评论概述: Sexy.... let me say it again... s-e-x-y
评论详情: Girl, if you want to look HoTT (yep double T), buy this shirt. I have it in white and black. I get compliments every time I wear it.  Love it!!!
The criss cross straps on this sports bra make it a cute under layer for backless tops. It fits true to size and is good quality fabric.
Seriously love this sports bra! It’s soft in texture light weight but keeps you feeling secure.
This shirt is extremely thin and completely see through. That being said it is SO soft and fits perfectly. I needed it for my back tattoo that I was getting and it served it’s purpose.
Very thin and low cut. Will probably wear under other shirts
Love it so much i got it in pink, black, white and this tan color
Love the material. One thing colors aren’t as bright as pictures show

I am 5’3” 135lbs I ordered a small and it fit perfect. I use it for yoga and the gym usually pair it with a pretty sports bra and it accents it so well. I plan to try in different colors.. I wore it out the other night with jeans and heels and it was fire!! Go buy it now

I love this top. It is so comfortable and fits great. When I run I am free and cool. Free with a shirt that flows and doesn’t hold me back and cool because the shirt is the perfect thickness. I live in HI and it is very hot right now this shirt is working!
Love how this bra fits & feels. Very light weight but supportive.
Ordered a small and fit perfectly! Love the material, very soft, and loose fitting. Just like I wanted!

The fit and material of this top is great. My only complaint is the the color was a little misleading. I ordered rose red, which looks like a dusty darkish pink in the photo, and it showed up bright hot pink. So just be aware of that when ordering rose red. I also have this top in white and it is my favorite workout top. I have a pretty average body type (not super athletic) and it is very flattering.

评论概述: Nice color, sizes as expected, heavy, does wrinkle
评论详情: Hangs heavy, i like it, does wrinkle on hanger hang drying

Double check your size. I ordered size XS and the bag that it came in had an XS sticker on it but a size small was inside. That’s the only reason I took off a star. I’m gonna keep it just to avoid the hassle of another return since it’s not too bad of a fit and I like the style.

评论概述: I LOVE THIS TANK! Great, random find!
评论详情: This tank top is EVERYTHING! I have navy, black and white and I love them. I use them to work out, lounge and look sexy, or throw a cardigan over it to go out. It’s honestly THAT versatile! BUY IT! You won’t be disappointed and neither will your significant other!! Sexy and can be used for so, so much.
Soft and love the feel but all the colors show sweat and stain, can only wear the black.

It’s just ok. Material isn’t what I expected, which is my bad for not reading the description of what it was made of. I thought it would be a softer cotton blend type of shirt but it’s more of a slick, workout material. It fits fine, but I’ve always felt fabrics like that aren’t typically flattering if you tend to carry weight in your mid section because they cling. I’m going to keep it, but not very impressed.
Was hoping to wear this without a bra but it’s completely see through. Also the back doesn’t go as low as I thought. soft though.

I’m in love with this tank top, I got a size large in black and it has become my go to for working out or on just these hot summer days. I am 5’5, 160ibs and have a tummy that has been lived in. It is tight along my bust but not along the waist. The back is my favorite part, I can feel the summer breeze or ac and show off my favorite back of my sports bra that has the cross crossing design.

Really cute top! I was worried about what size I should buy. I’m 5’4” and about 135 pounds. I ordered the small and it was great. I’m a 34DD so the sides are a little small but with a cute bralette it’s perfect. I only gave it 4 stars because I felt like the fabric wasn’t as soft as everyone made it out to be but I’m picky. I was hoping for a more cotton feel but that’s my fault for not reading the description fully. Either way it’s a great top to either lounge in or to go out. I’d like to order again in more colors!
I absolutely love this shirt ! I have been looking for a backless top and this is it !  I wanted it to show my back tattoo and shows the whole thing I love it and it fits so well
This top fits true to size. Love the material!! So flattering will be buying more colors! Bought the greenish one! Size Med I am 5'5, 130lbs
My favorite workout top. Color as shown and it's washed well.

评论概述: Simple workout or run to town shirt…
评论详情: Quality seems ok and price not to terrible but definitely worth trying out one 1st to see your true thoughts. I like them for what I need them for 🚴‍♀️ in the heat bc they are super lightweight.
I ordered a small bc I’m small chested, but I have a pretty wide rib cage so a little snug around that area.
Good quality, soft and comfortable. Bought for the gym.
Nice too. Although does wrinkle easily.

评论概述: My misunderstanding. Only comes with ultra simple green part
评论详情: Black strappy part is what makes it cute. Would be fine if you already have a cute sports bra to wear with it

I got a medium and it’s a little small and short on me. the color is great, but the material is quite thin. It does not come with the black sports bra underneath as seen in the photo, so I should’ve read the description better. I won’t be wearing this to work out in, maybe around the house or as a beach cove up.
This material is soooo buttery soft and comfortable! The open back makes it super cute and functional at the gym. I loved these so much I bought them in 3 colors :)
Soft, fits well

评论概述: I could wear it everyday- and I WILL
评论详情: Okay, I have now ordered every color, so I can officially give my happy review. I didn’t want to give some amazing review and then amazon sell out. This shirt is comfortable. Not see through. It’s soft. I’m very tall, and have very broad shoulders, so the way it fits on me is Amazing! I didn’t have to tie a knot in the front or anything. It fits perfectly. I’m 5’10, 38D with broad shoulders if that helps you gauge. I’m absolutely in love with this shirt. Had to order another sports bra just so I could wear one everyday. Haha

评论概述: Small and not stretchy at all
评论详情: This material is not what I'm looking for in a workout top. Not stretchy, binding, and runs very small. Returned.

评论概述: Really thin material, back is not as pictured
评论详情: I didn't even try it on because it was not what I expected at all. I thought the bra was built in. The pictures of the back is not what you get. Some of those straps shown are from the bra she is wearing, not the top itself.
This shirt is a little bit see through in the white, but not bad. Very very cute on! I will be buying in other colors!
Love this tank top, BUT it fell apart the first time I washed it. I love it though so I ordered 2 more!

I’ve worn this shirt during workouts and to go out to run errands. The front is a flattering cut and the back shows a large amount of back, which can be really cute if you have a pretty sports bra you’re willing to show off. The material is soft and a bit stretchy. Living in a warm/humid climate, it’s perfect to stay cool. I’m definitely going to buy more colors soon. I purchased this shirt in the lavender, I would say it’s true to color, if anything just a tad lighter.
It's a little on the long side for my short tordo but it's still very flattering AMF cute. I'm obsessed.  Going to buy more colors for sure.
I weightlift and it's very lightweight and flattering to my back!

评论概述: Love these tops. Great for out to dinner not just workouts.
评论详情: Gorgeous tops. Wicking. Flattering. Note the photo looks like they are short but they are not. I’m long waisted and they are not too short.
Good thin workout top, very breezy and cute. It does show sweat though so be aware

评论概述: Nice, but runs a little large
评论详情: I really like this top i think it is super cute. I normally wear a medium so I got a medium but with the open back, a small prob would fit better. Its a little loose around my traps. But not enough to warrant a return, ill wash it after the gym tonight and hope it shrinks just a little :) im 5'6" 160lbs for reference.
The color is pretty but it does not have a built in bra like it appears/similar shirts do.
Stop sending out used products this is the second time this happens. It's gross among other things.
Lightweight material,very comfortable
I paired this tank with an accent bra, it's super soft, a but in the thinner side, but not see-through! Very comfy, i wouldn't necessarily use it for working out though.

Everything was great. Kind of soft material the only thing is I wish they offered smaller sizes. It’s definitely a loose top which is fine but it hangs a bit under the arms and looks sloppy? Definitely try this tank out I do love it  . Probably will order the other colors just to have
I've worn and washed this almost a dozen times and it hasn't lost its shape or become stretched out.  It's a great work out top.
excellent for just about anything you do! Good quality and comfort. I Purchased large, in gray color, returned because the gray is so dingy. Definitely will try again in other colors!

Fabric is really soft n silky feeling, and it would be flattering except the cut around the boob area is all off. It buckles out by the armpits, and is cut too narrow in the chest. Bummer, because the rest of the shirt is lovely.
Size was a little too big but for the gym, it was perfect. Love the softness and comfort.

评论概述: Very comfortable and cute workout tang top
评论详情: This fit very well and I have a larger chest. I was happy with how comfortable it is and plan to buy more. It also sits well on my chest and doesn’t move too much when when I am working out.
See through, poor material. Find another brand.
Solid for the price and holds a c cup well.

评论概述: Cute w a sexy open back
评论详情: This top is super cute . It's a little loose (as expected, so I tie a little knot in the front/side of it for a fitted look. Looks great w a strappy sports bra . I ordered a small. I'm 5'7" and about 125pounds . 34c bra size . I just ordered it in three more colors . The white one is the one I have now and ordered in pink , black and rose :)

I’m pear shaped and usually a medium to large in shirts.. I got this in a medium because I wanted to try it with no bra as an open back shirt and it fits perfectly... still kind of lose in the front but fitted enough on the back to cover any back fat. I am a 36c in bra and the shirt is still not tight on my breast at all.. I got it in two colors and wish they had more

Love love love this shirt! The dark blueish is beautiful and matches my hair color right now. It's super sexy and clingy and soft and smooth. I wear a high impact and full coverage sports bra underneath and it's a super cute pairing. I'm a 30DD and the small fits perfectly. I love the peekaboo back and all the straps. Will recommend.

The top came with some kind of tear or scratch on the top side didn’t like that. But the fit n style is what I’ve been looking for. For those of you who lift n work out this is THEE top. I’m still going to order more in every freaking color I loved it!💪🏼👍🏼
This shirt fits perfectly, I wore it to the gym and lifted with no problem. I will be buying more to also wear out on sunny days!
This top holds it shape very well, even when working out. Its super cute with legging,bike shirts or a pair of cut offs. A great way to Show off your strappy bras and still remain modest.

Super cute and comfy. The only thing with mine is that in the back It didn't come with a strap connecting the 2 sides together so there for the whole time I was exercising I had to keep pushing both straps up because it wouldn't stay in place. Im going to return it to get the right ones.

This shirt is so comfortable and and very soft. I love that it shows the back of my sports bras. I live in Florida so it is perfect for my work outs. I am going to order another. The fit is nice. It is a little loose around my arms but it doesn’t bother me at all.

评论概述: Great shirt!  I will purchase in other colors!
评论详情: The shirt fits perfectly.  It's soft and comfortable!  LOVE it!

This shirt has a very flattering cut. It is a LOT shorter than it looks in the picture, so take that into account. It's not a crop, but if you have a longer torso, it will not bunch up much at the bottom. The material isn't super buttery soft like I expected, but it still hangs in an attractive way.

Super comfortable and sexy. If I were to purchase this again I'd buy it one size smaller because it fits very very loose. The black is a more muted charcoal black which I hoped it was more of a true midnight black.

I love this top!! It’s so silky smooth and comfortable - I just bought another one because I love it so much. The purple color is so pretty and elegant. Note that that strappy black bra does not come with the top, the advertising photos are a little misleading. I’m 5’5”, 140 pounds and got a small, which is my normal size and it fits me well.
Shirt is much longer than I expected it to be, but as a petite person I’m not too disappointed. Would probably size down if I was under 5’3.
Cute xs is a little small at the top but I am someone who prefers my shirts lower on my chest so I’m pulling it down constantly. So get a small if u like the fit lower on ur chest.

Love Love Love this top!! Finally a shirt that is not too long or short! I'm 5'4" and heavy around the middle and this XL fit perfect! Hides the pooch but the girls look great and the back is so pretty with a strappy sports bra!

评论概述: Super cute and amazingly soft material
评论详情: This shirt runs big simply because the entire back is open. I wish I would have gotten an extra small. Even still it’s flattering and super cute! I love the green color.
I ended up buying this in more colors because they’re so nice. Soft stretchy material and very well made. Fits really loose, but long enough to tie in the back and still is flattering.

评论概述: Excellent! feels great and NOT to tight around my belly. LOVE the color! will buy more for sure!
评论详情: Excellent! soft material and super cute without being too young looking.
